idiomes.items: one language known by its creator

items.name: Amfibi
entries: <$title_short_name$> can breathe air and water.

items.name: Camuflatge dels Aiguamolls
entries: <$title_short_name$> has advantage on Destresa ({@skill Sigil}) made to hide in swampy terrain.

items.name: Salt Dempeus
entries: <$title_short_name$>'s long jump is fins a 20 peus and their high jump is fins a 10 peus, with or without a running start.

trait.name: Gnom de les profunditatse
trait.ref: {@race Gnom (de les Profunditats)|DMG|Gnom de les profunditatse}

items.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: <$title_short_name$>'s habilitat de llançament de conjurs innata is Intel·ligència (spell save DC <$spell_dc__int$>). <$title_short_name$> pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

items.name: Astúcia Gnoma
entries: <$title_short_name$> has advantage on all Intel·ligència, Saviesa, and Carisma saving throws against magic.

items.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The dracolich té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

items.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: <$title_short_name$>'s habilitat de llançament de conjurs innata is Carisma (spell save DC <$spell_dc__cha$>). <$title_short_name$> pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

items.name: Ascendència Faèrica
entries: <$title_short_name$> has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put <$short_name$> to sleep.

items.name: Sensible al Sol
entries: While in sunlight, <$short_name$> has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) que involucrin la vista.

items.name: Resiliència Nana
entries: <$title_short_name$> has advantage on saving throws against poison, and has resistance against poison damage.

items.name: Enlarge (es Recarrega amb un descans Curt o Llarg)
entries: For 1 minute, <$short_name$> magically increases in size, along with anything they are wearing or carrying. While enlarged, <$short_name$> is Large, doubles their damage dice on Força-based weapon attacks (ja sumat a l'atacs), and makes Força checks and Força saving throws with advantage. If <$short_name$> lacks the room to become Large, they attain the maximum size possible in the space available.

items.name: Invisibility (es Recarrega amb un descans Curt o Llarg)
entries: <$title_short_name$> magically turns {@condition invisible} until they attack, cast a spell, or use their Enlarge, or until their concentration is broken, up to 1 hour (com si es concentrés en un conjur). Any equipment <$short_name$> wears or carries is invisible with them.

items.name: Alè de Acid {@recharge 5}
entries: The half-dragon exhala àcid en una línia de 60 peus de llarg i 5 d'ample. Tota criatura dins de la línia ha de salvar per Destresa (CD 18). Qui falli rep 54 ({@damage 12d8}) de dany d'àcid; qui superi, en rep la meitat.

items.name: Alè de Llamp {@recharge 5}
entries: The half-dragon exhala lamps en una línia de 90 peus de llarg i 5 d'ample. Tota criatura dins de la línia ha de salvar per Destresa (CD 19). Qui falli rep 66 ({@damage 12d10}) de dany elèctric; qui superi, en rep la meitat.

items.name: Alèns d'Atac {@recharge 5}
entries: The half-dragon uses one of the following breath weapons.

items.name: Alè de Foc.
items.entry: The half-dragon exhala foc en una línia de 60 peus de llarg i 5 d'ample. Tota criatura dins de la línia ha de salvar per Destresa (CD 18). Qui falli rep 45 ({@damage 13d6}) de dany de foc; qui superi, en rep la meitat.

items.name: Sleep Breath.
items.entry: The half-dragon exhales sleep gas en un con de 60 peus. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea ha de salvar per Constitució (CD 18). Si falla, fall {@condition inconscient} durant 10 minuts. This effect ends for a creature if the creature takes damage or someone uses an action to wake it.

items.name: Alèns d'Atac {@recharge 5}
entries: The half-dragon uses one of the following breath weapons.

items.name: Alè Àcid.
items.entry: The half-dragon exhala àcid en una línia de 60 peus de llarg i 5 d'ample. Tota criatura dins de la línia ha de salvar per Destresa (CD 18). Qui falli rep 54 ({@damage 12d8}) de dany d'àcid; qui superi, en rep la meitat.

items.name: Slowing Breath.
items.entry: The half-dragon exhales gas en un con de 60 peus. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea must succeed on a DC 18 Constitució saving throw. Si falla, the creature can't use reactions, its speed is halved, and it can't make more than one attack on its turn. A més, the creature can use either an action or a bonus action on its turn, but not both. These effects last durant 1 minut. The creature pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, ending the effect on itself with a successful save.

items.name: Alèns d'Atac {@recharge 5}
entries: The half-dragon uses one of the following breath weapons.

items.name: Alè de Foc.
items.entry: The half-dragon exhales fire en un con de 60 peus. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea ha de salvar per Destresa (CD 21). Qui falli rep 66 ({@damage 12d10}) de dany de foc; qui superi, en rep la meitat.

items.name: Weakening Breath.
items.entry: The half-dragon exhales gas en un con de 60 peus. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea ha de salvar per Força (CD 21). Si falla, have disadvantage on Força-based attack rolls, Força checks, and Força saving throws durant 1 minut. Una criatura pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera.

items.name: Alè de Poison {@recharge 5}
entries: The half-dragon exhales poisonous gas en un con de 60 peus. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea ha de salvar per Constitució (CD 18). Qui falli rep 56 ({@damage 16d6}) de dany de verí; qui superi, en rep la meitat.

items.name: Alè de Fire {@recharge 5}
entries: The half-dragon exhales fire en un con de 60 peus. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea ha de salvar per Destresa (CD 21). Qui falli rep 63 ({@damage 18d6}) de dany de foc; qui superi, en rep la meitat.

items.name: Alèns d'Atac {@recharge 5}
entries: The half-dragon uses one of the following breath weapons.

items.name: Alè Gèlid.
items.entry: The half-dragon exhales an icy blast en un con de 60 peus. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea ha de salvar per Constitució (CD 20). Qui falli rep 58 ({@damage 13d8}) de dany de fred; qui superi, en rep la meitat.

items.name: Paralyzing Breath.
items.entry: The half-dragon exhales paralyzing gas en un con de 60 peus. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea ha de salvar per Constitució (CD 20). Si falla, està {@condition paralitzat} durant 1 minut. Una criatura pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera.

items.name: Alè de Cold {@recharge 5}
entries: The half-dragon exhales an icy blast en un con de 60 peus. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea ha de salvar per Constitució (CD 19). Qui falli rep 54 ({@damage 12d8}) de dany de fred; qui superi, en rep la meitat.

items.name: Fugida Veloç
entries: <$title_short_name$> can take the {@action Destravar-se} or {@action Amagar-se} action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

items.name: Ascendència Faèrica
entries: <$title_short_name$> has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put <$title_short_name$> to sleep.

items.name: Implacable Endurance
entries: When reduced to 0 hit points, <$title_short_name$> drops to 1 hit point instead (but can't do this again until they finish a long rest).

items.name: Atac Despietat
entries: When they score a critical hit, <$title_short_name$> can roll one of the weapon's damage dice and add it to the extra damage of the critical hit.

items.name: Ascendència Faèrica
entries: <$title_short_name$> has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put <$title_short_name$> to sleep.

items.name: Alè de Acid {@recharge 5}
entries: The half-dragon exhala àcid en una línia de 30 peus de llarg i 5 d'ample. Tota criatura dins de la línia ha de salvar per Destresa (CD 14). Qui falli rep 49 ({@damage 11d8}) de dany d'àcid; qui superi, en rep la meitat.

items.name: Alè de Llamp {@recharge 5}
entries: The half-dragon exhala lamps en una línia de 60 peus de llarg i 5 d'ample. Tota criatura dins de la línia ha de salvar per Destresa (CD 16). Qui falli rep 55 ({@damage 10d10}) de dany elèctric; qui superi, en rep la meitat.

items.entry: The half-dragon exhala foc en una línia de 40 peus de llarg i 5 d'ample. Tota criatura dins de la línia ha de salvar per Destresa (CD 14). Qui falli rep 42 ({@damage 12d6}) de dany de foc; qui superi, en rep la meitat.

items.name: Sensible al Sol
entries: While in sunlight, <$title_short_name$> has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) que involucrin la vista.

items.name: Estratègies de Manada
entries: <$title_short_name$> has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of their allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitat}.

items.name: Alè de Acid {@recharge 5}
entries: The half-dragon exhala àcid en una línia de 15 peus de llarg i 5 d'ample. Tota criatura dins de la línia ha de salvar per Destresa (CD 11). Qui falli rep 22 ({@damage 5d8}) de dany d'àcid; qui superi, en rep la meitat.

items.name: Alè Gèlid.

Una criatura pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera.

entries: The half-dragon exhales an icy blast of hail en un con de 15 peus. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea ha de salvar per Constitució (CD 12). Qui falli rep 22 ({@damage 5d8}) de dany de fred; qui superi, en rep la meitat.

items.name: Aguantar la Respiració
entries: <$title_short_name$> can hold their breath for up to 15 minuts seguits.

items.name: Amfibi
entries: <$title_short_name$> can breathe air and water.

items.name: Resiliència Nana
entries: <$title_short_name$> has advantage on saving throws against poison, and has resistance against poison damage.

items.name: Agressivitat
entries: Com a acció bonus, <$title_short_name$> can move up to your speed toward a hostile creature that they can see.

items.name: Astúcia Gnoma
entries: <$title_short_name$> has advantage on all Intel·ligència, Saviesa, and Carisma saving throws against magic.

items.name: Living Shadow
entries: Quan és dins de llum tènue o de foscor the dragon has resistance to damage that isn't force, psychic, or radiant.

items.name: Sigil de l'Ombra
entries: Quan és dins de llum tènue o de foscor the dragon can take the {@action Amagar-se} action as a bonus action.

items.name: Sensible al Sol
entries: the dragon té desavantatge quan li toca llum solar, as well as a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) que involucrin la vista.

idiomes.replace: comprèn els idiomes que comprenia en vida però no pot parlar
idiomes.items: comprèn els idiomes que comprenia en vida però no pot parlar

items.name: Halfling Nimbleness
entries: <$title_short_name$> can move through a space of a Medium or larger creature.

items.name: Coratge
entries: <$title_short_name$> has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition acovardit}.

items.name: Agilitat Felina
entries: When <$title_short_name$> moves on its turn in combat, they can double their speed fins el final del torn. Once they uses this ability, <$title_short_name$> can't use it again until they moves 0 feet on one of their turns.

items.name: Urpes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit <$to_hit__str$>} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}<$damage_avg__2.5+str$> ({@damage 1d4<$damage_mod__str$>}) de dany tallant.

items.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: <$title_short_name$>'s habilitat de llançament de conjurs innata is Carisma (spell save DC <$spell_dc__cha$>). <$title_short_name$> pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

items.name: Curse (es Recarrega amb un Descans Llarg)
entries: The Vistana targets one creature that it can see within 30 feet of it. The target must succeed on a {@dc <$spell_dc__cha$>} Saviesa saving throw or be cursed. The Vistana chooses the curse's effect from the options that follow; other Vistani curses are possible. All such effects deal psychic damage to the Vistani who uttered them when they end:

items: The target is unable to perform a certain kind of act involving fine motor control, such as tying knots, writing, playing an instrument, sewing, or casting spells that have somatic components. When this curse ends, the Vistana rep {@damage 1d6} de dany psíquic.

The target's appearance changes in a sinister yet purely cosmetic way. For example, the curse can place a scar on the target's face, turn the target's teeth into yellow fangs, or give the target bad breath. When this curse ends, the Vistana it rep {@damage 1d6} de dany psíquic.

A nonmagical item in the target's possession (chosen by the DM) disappears and can't be found until the curse ends. The lost item can weigh no more than 1 pound. When this curse ends, the Vistana rep {@damage 1d6} de dany psíquic.
The target gains vulnerability to a damage type of the Vistana's choice. When this curse ends, the Vistana rep {@damage 3d6} de dany psíquic.
The target has disadvantage on ability checks and saving throws tied to one ability score of the Vistana's choice. When this curse ends, the Vistana rep {@damage 3d6} de dany psíquic.

The target's attunement to one magic item (chosen by the DM) ends, and the target can't attune to the chosen item until the curse ends. When this curse ends, the Vistana rep {@damage 5d6} de dany psíquic.
The target is {@condition encegat}, {@condition eixordat}, or both. When this curse ends, the Vistana rep {@damage 5d6} de dany psíquic.

entries: The curse lasts until ended with un conjur {@spell restabliment superior}, un conjur {@spell anul·lar maledicció}, or similar magic. It doesn't end when the target dies. If a cursed target is returned to life, the curse remains in effect.

items.name: Evil Eye (es Recarrega amb un descans Curt o Llarg)
entries: Com a acció, a Vistana can target a creature within 10 feet that the Vistana can see. This magical ability, which the Vistani call the Evil Eye, duplicates the duration and effect of the {@spell amistat animal}, {@spell fascinar persona}, o {@spell immobilitzar humanoide} spell (Vistana's choice; spell {@dc <$spell_dc__cha$>}), but requires neither somatic nor material components. If the target succeeds on the save, the Vistana is {@condition encegat} fins el final del proper torn de the Vistana.

A Vistana who uses Evil Eye can't use it again before finishing a short or long rest. Once a target succeeds on a saving throw against a Vistana's Evil Eye, it is immune to the Evil Eye of all Vistani for 24 hours.

items.name: Amfibi
entries: <$title_short_name$> can breathe air and water.

items.name: Ascendència Faèrica
entries: <$title_short_name$> has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition fascinat}, and magic can't put <$short_name$> to sleep.

items.name: Màscara del Sotabosc
entries: <$title_short_name$> can attempt to {@action Amagar-se} even when they are only lightly obscured by foliage, heavy rain, falling snow, mist, and other natural phenomena.
